Minimal Chrome LLM sidebar for software engineers

As an engineer with over 15 years in software development, I found myself constantly relying on Claude LLM for my daily work these days - from code reviews to documentation checks and writing quick code snippets. But like many of us, I struggle with having too many Chrome tabs open, often losing track of my Claude conversation.

I created this simple sidebar extension to solve my own problem, and I hope it helps other engineers too. It lets you quickly pull up Claude whenever you need it and hide it when you're done - no more searching through tabs!

While it's a humble solution, it's made my workflow much smoother, especially when I need quick help with:
